column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place had been my go-to for years now. I'm never disappointed with anything I eat here. The chocolate chip walnut cookie is the best I've ever had
column2: the coffee and espresso is always spot-on
column3: and the service is always great. The staff is SUPER friendly
column4: and love talking to the customers and getting to know them. All the friends and family I've brought here love it just as much as I do. 5 stars isn't enough to give to Common Bond
column5: and it'll be a place I visit often for many years to come.
